titleStmt.title: An elegie offered up to the memory of that late faithfull servant of God, Mr. Jeremiah Burroughs minister of the Word at Giles Cripplegate and Stepney.
titleStmt.author: I. C.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Per me, I.C.
In verse: "To adde more ashes to our mortall Store," ...
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library.
